name: Don't Not Move
description:
This game is a 2D rage-inducing dodging game with slippery physics.
Play as a circle within an arena that constantly moves, all the while
dodging infinite waves of squares whose only goal is to end your fun.
The more waves you survive, the more points you rack up, and the more
color schemes you can unlock, which provide a fresh new gaming experience.

SPACE to start the game, and use Q/E to change the color.  Every 30 points you unlock one of the 32 colors.   Use WASD to move the player, and hold SPACE to build up a 'boost'.

Have fun!
